content: मुह् {c4c} <ab>P.</ab> (मुह्यति, मुग्ध or मूढ) {@--1@} To faint, swoon, lose consciousness, become senseless; इहाहं द्रष्टुमाह्नं तां स्मरन्नेवं मुमोह सः <ls>Bk. 6. 21</ls>, <ls n="Bk.">1. 20</ls>; <ls n="Bk.">15. 16.</ls> {@--2@} To be perplexed or bewilddered, to be disturbed in mind, be at a loss; आपत्स्वपि न मुह्यंति नराः पंडितबुद्धयः <ls>H. 1. 166</ls>, <ls>Ki. 18. 9.</ls> {@--3@} To be foolish, stupid, or infatuated. {@--4@} To fail. {@--5@} To err, mistake. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} (मोहयति-ते) {@--1@} To stupefy, infatuate; मा मूमुहत्खलु भवंतमनन्यजन्मा <ls>Māl. 1. 32.</ls> {@--2@} To confound, bewilder, perplex; <ls>Bg. 3. 2</ls>, <ls n="Bg.">4. 16.</ls> {@--3@} To throw into confusion. {@--4@} To cause to err or mistake.
